datasets.name: temporal-trends-contingency-table.csv
datasets.description: Dataset contains temporal trends in the introduction pathways of non-native flora (plants) in the region of Catalonia.

raw.name: introduction.period
raw.description: This column represents different time periods, related to when non-native plant species were introduced into the region.

raw.name: pathway
raw.description: This column represents different modes or routes through which non-native plant species were introduced, such as "AgriForest" (agriculture and forestry - plants introduced for cultivation to provide food or timber), "Gardening" (plants introduced for cultivation as ornamentals or for medicinal use), and "Unintentional" (plants introduced accidentally with the sowing of contaminated seed lots, global trade and tourism).

raw.name: n
raw.description: This column represents the frequency or count of non-native plant species introductions for each combination of introduction period and pathway.

datasets.name: invaded_niche_pathways.csv
datasets.description: The data for the analysis of pathway-specific differences in the invaded niche.

raw.name: n.gard
raw.description: The count or frequency of non-native plant species introduced through the "Gardening" pathway.

raw.name: n.unint
raw.description: The count or frequency of non-native plant species introduced through the "Unintentional" pathway

raw.name: n.agfo
raw.description: The count or frequency of non-native plant species introduced through the "AgriForest" (Agriculture and Forestry) pathway

raw.name: n.total
raw.description: The total count or frequency of non-native plant species across all introduction pathways.

raw.name: habitat
raw.description: A categorical variable representing the habitat type, selected from the ten most widespread habitat types in the Barcelona province

raw.name: elevation
raw.description: The elevation (in meters) of the sampled plot or location

raw.name: cropland.1956.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956

raw.name: urban.1956.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer (within a 50-meter radius) of 50 meters around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956

raw.name: cropland.1993.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius)  around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993

raw.name: urban.1993.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993

raw.name: cropland.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009

raw.name: urban.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009

raw.name: cropland.1956.500m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 500 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956

raw.name: urban.1956.500m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 50 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956

raw.name: cropland.1993.500m
raw.description: This variable represent the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 500 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993

raw.name: urban.1993.500m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 500 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993.

raw.name: cropland.2009.500m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 500 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009.

raw.name: urban.2009.500m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 500 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009.

raw.name: cropland.1956.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956.

raw.name: urban.1956.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1956.

raw.name: cropland.1993.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993.

raw.name: urban.1993.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 1993.

raw.name: cropland.2009.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of cropland in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009.

raw.name: urban.2009.1000m
raw.description: This variable represents the percentage of urban land cover in a buffer of 1000 meters (within a 50-meter radius) around the sampled plot or location for the year 2009.

raw.name: progressive.1956.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1956 and 2009. It categorizes changes as progressive, indicating an increase in urban or cropland areas over this period.

raw.name: regressive.1956.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1956 and 2009. It categorizes changes as regressive, indicating a decrease in urban or cropland areas over this period.

raw.name: no.changes.1956.2009.50m
raw.description: his variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1956 and 2009. It categorizes areas where there have been no significant changes in urban or cropland cover over this period.

raw.name: progressive.1993.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1993 and 2009. It categorizes changes as progressive, indicating an increase in urban or cropland areas over this period.

raw.name: regressive.1993.2009.50m
raw.description: This variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1993 and 2009. It categorizes changes as regressive, indicating a decrease in urban or cropland areas over this period.

raw.name: no.changes.1993.2009.50m
raw.description: his variable represents the historical landscape changes in a 50-meter buffer around the sampled plot or location between 1993 and 2009. It categorizes areas where there have been no significant changes in urban or cropland cover over this period.

raw.name: distance.stream
raw.description: The distance (in meters) from the sampled plot or location to the nearest main stream or waterway.

raw.name: distance.road
raw.description: The distance (in meters) from the sampled plot or location to the nearest main road.

raw.name: longitude
raw.description: The geographic coordinates of the sampled plot or location.

raw.name: latitude
raw.description: The geographic coordinates of the sampled plot or location.

raw.name: annual.temperature
raw.description: The mean annual temperature of the sampled plot or location.

raw.name: annual.rainfall
raw.description: The annual precipitation or rainfall of the sampled plot or location.

raw.name: annual.radiation
raw.description: The mean annual solar radiation (in kJ/m^2/day) of the sampled plot or location.

queries.question: How does the prevalence of non-native plants introduced via gardening vary based on habitat type?
In what context does the gardening pathway for introducing non-native plants show different prevalence styles across habitat types?
